title: impact of lockdown on the economy of north bengal with special reference to tourism industry of darjeeling district
Abstract: Darjeeling can be called an ideal vacation destination. Its comfortable weekend entrances, landscapes, colourful lakes, lush green tea gardens, wildlife sanctuary, adventure sports, pilgrimage sites, and mountain retreats attract the people from the different parts of the …

Authors: A Kar, HTK Le, HJ Miller
title: what is essential travel socio-economic differences in travel demand during the covid-19 lockdown
Abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic has profoundly reshaped urban mobility. During the lockdown, workers teleworked if possible and left home only for essential activities. Our study investigates the spatial patterns of essential travel and their socio-economic differences …
